mapper.select: SELECT GAMEHP FROM CROSS WHERE GAMESEQ = #{gameSeq}
SELECT GAMEDP FROM CROSS WHERE GAMESEQ = #{gameSeq}
SELECT GAMEAP FROM CROSS WHERE GAMESEQ = #{gameSeq}

SELECT T2.TOTALCNT, T1.GAMESEQ, T1.GAMEHOME, T1.GAMEAWAY, T1.GAMEHP, T1.GAMEDP, T1.GAMEAP, TO_CHAR(T1.GAMEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS GAMEDATE, T1.NO FROM (SELECT cross.* , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY GAMEDATE) AS NO FROM CROSS cross WHERE GAMEDATE > SYSDATE OR GAMERESULT IS NULL ) T1,(SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTALCNT FROM CROSS WHERE GAMEDATE > SYSDATE OR GAMERESULT IS NULL)T2 WHERE NO BETWEEN ((#{page_size} * (#{page_num}-1))+1) AND (#{page_size} * (#{page_num}-1))+#{page_size}
SELECT GAMESEQ, GAMEHOME, GAMEAWAY, GAMEHP, GAMEDP, GAMEAP, TO_CHAR(GAMEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS GAMEDATE FROM CROSS WHERE GAMERESULT IS NULL ORDER BY GAMEDATE DESC
SELECT GAMESEQ, GAMEHOME, GAMEAWAY, GAMEHS, GAMEAS, GAMEHP, GAMEDP, GAMEAP, TO_CHAR(GAMEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS GAMEDATE FROM CROSS WHERE GAMERESULT IS NOT NULL ORDER BY GAMEDATE DESC
SELECT GAMESEQ, GAMEHOME, GAMEAWAY, GAMEHP, GAMEDP, GAMEAP, GAMEHS, GAMEAS, TO_CHAR(GAMEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS GAMEDATE FROM CROSS ORDER BY GAMEDATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CROSS ( GAMESEQ, GAMEHOME, GAMEAWAY, GAMEHP, GAMEDP, GAMEAP, GAMEDATE, GAMEREGID, GAMEREGDT ) VALUES ( gameSeq.NEXTVAL, #{gameHome}, #{gameAway}, #{gameHp}, #{gameDp}, #{gameAp}, TO_DATE(#{gameDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 'ADMIN', SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE cross SET GAMEHS = #{gameHs}, GAMEAS = #{gameAs}, GAMEMODID = #{gameModId}, GAMEMODDT = SYSDATE WHERE GAMESEQ = #{gameSeq}
